originalText.text: I recently had my antique rug cleaned by this wonderful rug cleaning service, and I couldn't be happier with the outcome. Their expertise in handling delicate rugs, like my antique piece, is exceptional. They specialize in Oriental, Persian, Turkish, and Moroccan rug cleaning, ensuring that each rug receives the utmost care and attention. The process was simple yet thorough. After calling to schedule a free price estimate, the team visited my home, assessed the work required, and provided me with a competitive price. They collected my rug, moved my furniture, and rolled it carefully for transportation. After 7-9 days, my rug was returned to me looking revitalized. Their dedication to customer satisfaction is commendable!!

originalText.text: At Turkish Rug Care, they take great pride in their rug cleaning process, ensuring each rug is thoroughly cleaned and treated with care. They specialize in Oriental, antique, and hand-knotted rugs, providing a range of services including silk and wool cleaning, as well as pet stain removal from oriental rugs. As a customer, I was impressed with their attention to detail and the quality of their service. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, and they provided me with a free price estimate before beginning any work. I highly recommend Turkish Rug Care for anyone in need of professional rug cleaning services.

originalText.text: Using the most latest techniques, they clean a variety of rugs, including viscose, wool, silk, hand-knotted, woven, and flat-weave area rugs. They also provide a pet stain removal service for Oriental rugs. Thanks to their thorough and efficient rug cleaning method, your rug will be delivered to you in flawless condition. They give excellent customer service and go above and above to ensure that their clients are satisfied.

originalText.text: Turkish Rug Care is an exceptional rug cleaning service that provides top-notch Oriental rug cleaning, antique rug cleaning, and Turkish rug cleaning. They also offer Pakistani rug cleaning, viscose rug cleaning, Moroccan rug cleaning, and pet stain removal from Oriental rugs. They specialize in cleaning wool and silk rugs, as well as hand-knotted and woven area rugs, including flatweaves. The rug cleaning process is thorough and efficient, and the staff is friendly and professional. I highly recommend Turkish Rug Care for all your rug cleaning needs.
